alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 07 at 9:46AM MST until January 07 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON ABOVE 3500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 3500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Steady snow this morning will become showery this afternoon, but some of these showers will be heavy with poor visibility and rapid accumulation on roads. * WHERE...Areas above 3500 feet near Grand Canyon, North Rim and Valle. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Additional snow forecast from 9 AM Today to 5 PM Today: Grand Canyon 1 to 3 inches North Rim 1 to 3 inches Valle 1 to 3 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
